name: CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms.of_iso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
self : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
X Y : C
x✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
x✝ : P X
⊢ P Y
decl:
/-- A predicate `C → Prop` on the objects of a category is closed under isomorphisms
if whenever `P X`, then all the objects `Y` that are isomorphic to `X` also satisfy `P Y`. -/
class ClosedUnderIsomorphisms : Prop where
  of_iso {X Y : C} (_ : X ≅ Y) (_ : P X) : P Y

name: CategoryTheory.mem_of_iso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
X Y : C
e : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
hX : P X
⊢ P Y
decl:
lemma mem_of_iso [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P] {X Y : C} (e : X ≅ Y) (hX : P X) : P Y :=
  ClosedUnderIsomorphisms.of_iso e hX

name: CategoryTheory.mem_iff_of_iso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
X Y : C
e : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
⊢ Iff (P X) (P Y)
decl:
lemma mem_iff_of_iso [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P] {X Y : C} (e : X ≅ Y) : P X ↔ P Y :=
  ⟨mem_of_iso P e, mem_of_iso P e.symm⟩

name: CategoryTheory.mem_of_isIso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
hX : P X
⊢ P Y
decl:
lemma mem_of_isIso [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P] {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) [IsIso f] (hX : P X) : P Y :=
  mem_of_iso P (asIso f) hX

name: CategoryTheory.mem_iff_of_isIso
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
⊢ Iff (P X) (P Y)
decl:
lemma mem_iff_of_isIso [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P] {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) [IsIso f] : P X ↔ P Y :=
  mem_iff_of_iso P (asIso f)

name: CategoryTheory.mem_isoClosure_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
X : C
⊢ Iff (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P X) (Exists fun Y => Exists fun x => Nonempty (CategoryTheory.Iso X Y))
decl:
lemma mem_isoClosure_iff (X : C) :
    isoClosure P X ↔ ∃ (Y : C) (_ : P Y), Nonempty (X ≅ Y) := by rfl

name: CategoryTheory.mem_isoClosure
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
X Y : C
h : P X
e : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsIso e
⊢ CategoryTheory.isoClosure P Y
decl:
variable {P} in
lemma mem_isoClosure {X Y : C} (h : P X) (e : X ⟶ Y) [IsIso e] : isoClosure P Y :=
  ⟨X, h, ⟨(asIso e).symm⟩⟩

name: CategoryTheory.le_isoClosure
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
⊢ LE.le P (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P)
decl:
lemma le_isoClosure : P ≤ isoClosure P :=
  fun X hX => ⟨X, hX, ⟨Iso.refl X⟩⟩

name: CategoryTheory.monotone_isoClosure
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P Q : C → Prop
h : LE.le P Q
⊢ LE.le (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P) (CategoryTheory.isoClosure Q)
decl:
variable {P Q} in
lemma monotone_isoClosure (h : P ≤ Q) : isoClosure P ≤ isoClosure Q := by
  rintro X ⟨X', hX', ⟨e⟩⟩
  exact ⟨X', h _ hX', ⟨e⟩⟩

name: CategoryTheory.isoClosure_eq_self
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P) P
decl:
lemma isoClosure_eq_self [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms P] : isoClosure P = P := by
  apply le_antisymm
  · intro X ⟨Y, hY, ⟨e⟩⟩
    exact mem_of_iso P e.symm hY
  · exact le_isoClosure P

name: CategoryTheory.isoClosure_le_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P Q : C → Prop
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms Q
⊢ Iff (LE.le (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P) Q) (LE.le P Q)
decl:
lemma isoClosure_le_iff [ClosedUnderIsomorphisms Q] : isoClosure P ≤ Q ↔ P ≤ Q :=
  ⟨(le_isoClosure P).trans,
    fun h => (monotone_isoClosure h).trans (by rw [isoClosure_eq_self])⟩

name: CategoryTheory.instClosedUnderIsomorphismsIsoClosure
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
P : C → Prop
⊢ CategoryTheory.ClosedUnderIsomorphisms (CategoryTheory.isoClosure P)
decl:
instance : ClosedUnderIsomorphisms (isoClosure P) where
  of_iso := by
    rintro X Y e ⟨Z, hZ, ⟨f⟩⟩
    exact ⟨Z, hZ, ⟨e.symm.trans f⟩⟩
